Class ProjectRepository

java.lang.Object
Abstract.Repository<Project>
Project.ProjectRepository
public class ProjectRepository extends Repository<Project>
ProjectRepository handles the persistence and retrieval of Project entities from a CSV file. It implements the Singleton pattern to ensure a single instance interacts with the project data storage.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static ProjectRepository getInstance(String filePath)
      Retrieves the singleton instance of ProjectRepository. Initializes and stores the repository data on first access to ensure it's up-to-date.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the file path to the project CSV file
      Returns:
      the singleton instance of ProjectRepository

    • fromCSVRow

      public Project fromCSVRow(String row)
      Converts a CSV row into a Project object. Parses unit counts, prices, officer list, and visibility from the string row.
      Specified by:
      fromCSVRow in class Repository<Project>
      Parameters:
      row - a single line from the CSV representing a Project
      Returns:
      the constructed Project object

    • CSVHeader

      public String CSVHeader()
      Provides the header row for the CSV file, representing all Project fields.
      Specified by:

      Returns:
